question.question: What is the purpose of the FDI World Dental Federation's tooth numbering system?
question.option_a: To track dental caries progression over time
question.option_b: To identify and record dental anomalies and abnormalities
question.option_c: To facilitate international communication among dentists and researchers
question.option_d: To provide a standardized system for dental insurance claims
